name: Video Poker Live
description:
Video Poker Live by Simple Game is one of the most addictive video poker games you'll find in Mac App Store.

With 3 different video poker games, real card shuffling, and real paytables, you'll have Las Vegas with you anywhere, anytime.

Experience the BIG WIN excitement of video poker in the best video poker game!

FEATURES:

* Play online with other players, YOU are not alone!
* Share other players' luck by tapping balloons!
* Join Live Contests automatically and win HUGE prizes every 20 minutes!
* Become Poker King and win a HUGE prize!
* Online JACKPOT: it increases all day and all night, waiting for you to hit!
* FREE to play with free credits just for watching a video!
* 3 most popular video poker games: Jacks or Better, Deuces as Wild, Joker as Wild!
* Exactly like Vegas casino video poker! Real Vegas card shufflers, real paytables!
* Top payouts on all video poker games!
* Hit Royal Straight Flush to win JACKPOT with HUGE prize!
* Out of chips? Challenge your friends and win millions of bonus chips for FREE!

Note:
- This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes.
